Sarah Manlove Projects My Resume

Hello!

I'm Sarah.

I'm an aspiring web developer and UX designer. Feel free to send me a message! Can't wait to chat with you.

I'm an Informatics student at the University of Massachusetts Amherst with a passion for social justice in computing. I am the Head of Technology & Operations for Hack(H)er413 and a Rewriting the Code fellow. In my free time, I can be found with a book, petting a dog, or watching the livestream from the International Space Station.

Projects

As front-end developer for this hackathon project, I gathered content, designed, and coded the website for dog sitings on campus.

Five College Dog Spotter
I built this website for a campus organization that I co-founded, titled UMass Students In Tech, using HTML and CSS.

USIT Website
As Head of Technology & Operations for HackHer413, I joined forces with other students to build this hackathon website.

HackHer413 Website
I wrote this paper for a class titled "Social Issues in Computing".

Research Paper on Protection of User Data on Mobile Health Applications
